column1: All order reminders have been added to queue
column2: All order reminders have been added to queue

column1: Are you sure you want to reset any changes to the email subject / body?
column2: Are you sure you want to reset any changes to the email subject / body?

column1: Are you sure? It is NOT recommended to manually delete history.
column2: Are you sure? It is NOT recommended to manually delete history.

column1: Blacklist item has been successfully saved
column2: Blacklist item has been successfully saved

column1: Could not send reminder #%d. E-mailing may be disabled on the server, the reminder might not have a subject / body, or sending may be disabled due to products all being out of stock.
column2: Could not send reminder #%d. E-mailing may be disabled on the server, the reminder might not have a subject / body, or sending may be disabled due to products all being out of stock.

column1: Could not successfully send reminder email
column2: Could not successfully send reminder email

column1: Customers in these groups will NOT have reminders generated.
column2: Customers in these groups will NOT have reminders generated.

column1: Default customer name if customer did not supply name
column2: Default customer name if customer did not supply name

column1: Delay = current time - the delay reference. If the delay is greater than the delay you have set, then a reminder will be sent. For followup reminders, "Last Reminded Time" is highly recommended
column2: Delay = current time - the delay reference. If the delay is greater than the delay you have set, then a reminder will be sent. For followup reminders, "Last Reminded Time" is highly recommended

column1: Disabling will disable order reminder for the store. Currently queued items will be deleted at their send time instead of sent.
column2: Disabling will disable order reminder for the store. Currently queued items will be deleted at their send time instead of sent.

column1: Enter expiry (in days). Entering "0" means no expiry.
column2: Enter expiry (in days). Entering "0" means no expiry.

column1: Enter url parameters you want to add to the link in the email. They can be any parameters and are not google specific.
column2: Enter url parameters you want to add to the link in the email. They can be any parameters and are not google specific.

column1: Fixed amount discount for whole cart
column2: Fixed amount discount for whole cart

column1: For example, if you have a store wide cart rule that allows for discounts in certain conditions (orders > $500, 10% off if you buy 2 or more products, etc), then you need to set the priority of the reminder coupons to be greater than the priority of those cart rules or else the reminder coupon will prevent those rules from processing.
column2: For example, if you have a store wide cart rule that allows for discounts in certain conditions (orders > $500, 10% off if you buy 2 or more products, etc), then you need to set the priority of the reminder coupons to be greater than the priority of those cart rules or else the reminder coupon will prevent those rules from processing.

column1: How long to wait in days since the delay reference until a reminder is sent
column2: How long to wait in days since the delay reference until a reminder is sent

column1: If enabled then other rules will not be processed after this coupon is processed.
column2: If enabled then other rules will not be processed after this coupon is processed.

column1: If set to "Disabled", a coupon will not be generated
column2: If set to "Disabled", a coupon will not be generated

column1: If set to "Disabled", reminders will not be automatically generated (manual generation is still possible)
column2: If set to "Disabled", reminders will not be automatically generated (manual generation is still possible)

column1: If set to "Disabled", reminders will not be automatically sent (manual sending is still possible)
column2: If set to "Disabled", reminders will not be automatically sent (manual sending is still possible)

column1: If set to "Enabled", no more reminders will be sent if the customer clicks a link in the reminder e-mail
column2: If set to "Enabled", no more reminders will be sent if the customer clicks a link in the reminder e-mail

column1: If set to Disabled you must manually set up the cronjobs at [Magento root]/shell/extendware/ewreviewreminder/
column2: If set to Disabled you must manually set up the cronjobs at [Magento root]/shell/extendware/ewreviewreminder/

column1: Maximum number of reminders. Must be a number greater than 0. Please remember to configure reminders if you change this number
column2: Maximum number of reminders. Must be a number greater than 0. Please remember to configure reminders if you change this number

column1: Only enter numbers. If using a percentage off, then the whole number represents the percent off (20 = 20% discount). For fixed amounts it represents the dollar amount (20 = $20).
column2: Only enter numbers. If using a percentage off, then the whole number represents the percent off (20 = 20% discount). For fixed amounts it represents the dollar amount (20 = $20).

column1: Only enter numbers. This is the minimum value the customer must add to their cart for the coupon to be valid.
column2: Only enter numbers. This is the minimum value the customer must add to their cart for the coupon to be valid.

column1: Please <u>read the help descriptions, field descriptions, fieldset descriptions, and user guides</u> so you may configure this extension to suit your needs.
column2: Please <u>read the help descriptions, field descriptions, fieldset descriptions, and user guides</u> so you may configure this extension to suit your needs.

column1: Please select an item(s) before submitting to the mass processor
column2: Please select an item(s) before submitting to the mass processor

column1: Reminder email body and subject have been reset to default.
column2: Reminder email body and subject have been reset to default.

column1: Reminder followup number allowed based on store configuration. Reminder has been deleted
column2: Reminder followup number allowed based on store configuration. Reminder has been deleted

column1: Reminder has been successfully sent and deleted
column2: Reminder has been successfully sent and deleted

column1: Reminder with the same recovery code already exists
column2: Reminder with the same recovery code already exists

column1: Select the template of the e-mail. You can create your own in System -> Transactional Emails
column2: Select the template of the e-mail. You can create your own in System -> Transactional Emails

column1: Selected item(s) (%d) have been mass processed by the %s processor
column2: Selected item(s) (%d) have been mass processed by the %s processor

column1: Selected item(s) (%d) have failed to be mass processed by the %s processor
column2: Selected item(s) (%d) have failed to be mass processed by the %s processor

column1: Send a copy of the reminder to these e-mails.
column2: Send a copy of the reminder to these e-mails.

column1: Sending is disabled on the development server.
column2: Sending is disabled on the development server.

column1: The ID of the sales rule that will be copied. This can be found in Promotions -> Shopping Cart Price Rules.
column2: The ID of the sales rule that will be copied. This can be found in Promotions -> Shopping Cart Price Rules.

column1: The minimum numbers of days to wait from the last reminder stream until a customer / email can trigger a new reminder stream. Enter 0 to disable protection.
column2: The minimum numbers of days to wait from the last reminder stream until a customer / email can trigger a new reminder stream. Enter 0 to disable protection.

column1: The mode used to create the coupon. Copy requires you to create a coupon in Promotions -> Shopping Cart Price Rules which enables you to use advanced rules and conditions.
column2: The mode used to create the coupon. Copy requires you to create a coupon in Promotions -> Shopping Cart Price Rules which enables you to use advanced rules and conditions.

column1: The order reminder unsubscribe URL will only work after the reminder has been sent.
column2: The order reminder unsubscribe URL will only work after the reminder has been sent.

column1: The priority of the coupon. Useful if you have other shopping cart rules that need to be processed before this coupon.
column2: The priority of the coupon. Useful if you have other shopping cart rules that need to be processed before this coupon.

column1: This is useful to prevent customers from always receiving a reminder. Example: If you set this to 10 days, then a customers' order reminders will be ignored until 10 days after the last reminder stream was created.
column2: This is useful to prevent customers from always receiving a reminder. Example: If you set this to 10 days, then a customers' order reminders will be ignored until 10 days after the last reminder stream was created.

column1: To use the "Copy" mode, create a coupon in Promotions -> Shopping Cart Price Rules. Coupons will be created based on this coupon. This allows you to use advanced rules and conditions.
column2: To use the "Copy" mode, create a coupon in Promotions -> Shopping Cart Price Rules. Coupons will be created based on this coupon. This allows you to use advanced rules and conditions.

column1: Total of %d email(s) have been successfully sent
column2: Total of %d email(s) have been successfully sent

column1: You will no longer receive any more order reminder e-mails
column2: You will no longer receive any more order reminder e-mails
